attributes.action: appoint ministers for the various UK business / industry  economic sectors.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A minister would specialise in the UK development of various industies and companies. An example would be a minister for the steel/metal work industry, a minister for the automotive industry and a bio technology company minister.
They would have a number of aims such as the development of a british owned industry in their portfolio and for foreign companies to create new (not take over) plants within the UK. Both heavy and hi-tech industry is important to the UK. They would come under the sphere of the DTI.
